mapper.insert: insert into apart(build_year, dong, name, area, jibun, regional_code) values(#{build_year}, #{dong}, #{name}, #{area}, #{jibun}, #{regional_code})
mapper.select: select * from apart where (lat between #{swLat} and #{neLat}) and (lng between #{swLng} and #{neLng})

select * from apart
dong like concat('%', #{dong},'%')
order by length(dong) limit 10
